00025   template<typename REAL>
00026   class DenseMatrix
00027   {
00028   public:
00030         typedef std::size_t size_type;
00031         typedef typename std::vector<REAL> VType;
00032         typedef typename VType::const_iterator ConstVectorIterator;
00033         typedef typename VType::iterator VectorIterator;
00034 
00035   private:
00036         VType m_data;  // Matrix data is stored in an STL vector!
00037         std::size_t m_rows;          // Number of Matrix rows
00038         std::size_t m_cols;          // Number of Matrix columns
00039 
00040         static bool bScientific;
00041         static std::size_t nIndexWidth;
00042         static std::size_t nValueWidth;
00043         static std::size_t nValuePrecision;
00044         
00045 
00046         // function to calculate the modulus of a value
00047     REAL myabs (REAL x) const
00048     {
00049       if (x>=REAL(0)) 
00050                 return x; 
00051           else 
00052                 return -x;
00053     }
00054         
00055 
00056         // get matrix element for write access:
00057         inline REAL & at(const std::size_t row, const std::size_t col)
00058         {
00059           return m_data[row * m_cols + col];
00060         }
00061         
00062         // get matrix element for read-only access:
00063         inline const REAL & at(const std::size_t row, const std::size_t col) const
00064         {
00065           return m_data[row * m_cols + col];
00066         }
00067         
00068         
00069         
00070         
00071         
00072   public:
00073         
00074         // default constructor (empty Matrix)
00075         DenseMatrix()
00076           : m_data( 0, 0 )
00077           , m_rows( 0 )
00078           , m_cols( 0 )
00079         {
00080         }
00081         
00082         // constructor
00083         DenseMatrix( const std::size_t _rows, 
00084                                  const std::size_t _cols, 
00085                                  const REAL def_val=0 
00086                                  )
00087           : m_data( _rows*_cols, def_val )
00088           , m_rows( _rows )
00089           , m_cols( _cols )
00090         {
00091         }
00092 
00093     void addNewRow( const hdnum::Vector<REAL> & rowvector ){
00094       m_rows++;
00095       m_cols = rowvector.size();
00096       for(std::size_t i=0; i<m_cols; i++ )
00097         m_data.push_back( rowvector[i] );
00098     }
00099     /*
00100         // copy constructor (not needed, since it inherits from the STL vector)
00101         DenseMatrix( const DenseMatrix& A )
00102     {
00103           this->m_data = A.m_data;
00104           m_rows = A.m_rows;
00105           m_cols = A.m_cols;
00106     }
00107     */
00123         size_t rowsize () const
00124         {
00125           return m_rows;
00126         }
00127 
00143         size_t colsize () const
00144         {
00145           return m_cols;
00146         }
00147 
00148 
00149         // pretty-print output properties
00150         bool scientific() const 
00151         {
00152           return bScientific;
00153         }
00154

00179     {
00180       bScientific=b;
00181     }

00185     {
00186       return nIndexWidth;

00191     {
00192       return nValueWidth;

00197     {
00198       return nValuePrecision;

00264         // overloaded element access operators
00265         // write access on matrix element A_ij using A(i,j)
00266         inline REAL & operator()(const std::size_t row, const std::size_t col)
00267         {
00268           assert(row < m_rows|| col < m_cols);
00269           return at(row,col);
00270         }
00271         
00272         // read-access on matrix element A_ij using A(i,j)
00273         inline const REAL & operator()(const std::size_t row, const std::size_t col) const
00274         {
00275           assert(row < m_rows|| col < m_cols);
00276           return at(row,col);
00277         }
00278 
00279 
00280         // read-access on matrix element A_ij using A[i][j]
00281         const ConstVectorIterator operator[](const std::size_t row) const
00282         {
00283           assert(row < m_rows);
00284           return m_data.begin() + row * m_cols;
00285         }
00286 
00331         // write-access on matrix element A_ij using A[i][j]
00332         VectorIterator operator[](const std::size_t row)
00333         {
00334           assert(row < m_rows);
00335           return m_data.begin() + row * m_cols;
00336         }

00362         DenseMatrix& operator= (const DenseMatrix& A)
00363     {
00364           m_data = A.m_data;
00365           m_rows = A.m_rows;
00366           m_cols = A.m_cols;
00367           return *this;
00368     }

00393         DenseMatrix& operator= (const REAL value)
00394     {
00395       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00396         for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00397           (*this)(i,j) = value;
00398       return *this;
00399     }

00405         // Basic Matrix Operations
00406 
00414     DenseMatrix& operator+= (const DenseMatrix& B)
00415     {
00416       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); ++i) 
00417         for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); ++j) 
00418                   (*this)(i,j) += B(i,j);
00419       return *this;
00420     }
00421 
00429     DenseMatrix& operator-= (const DenseMatrix& B)
00430     {
00431       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); ++i) 
00432         for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); ++j) 
00433                   (*this)(i,j) -= B(i,j);
00434       return *this;
00435     }
00436 
00437 
00467     DenseMatrix& operator*= (const REAL s)
00468     {
00469       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); ++i) 
00470         for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); ++j) 
00471                   (*this)(i,j) *= s;
00472       return *this;
00473     }
00474 
00475 
00506     DenseMatrix& operator/= (const REAL s)
00507     {
00508       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); ++i) 
00509         for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); ++j) 
00510                   (*this)(i,j) /= s;
00511       return *this;
00512     }

00514 
00541         void update (const REAL s, const DenseMatrix& B)
00542     {
00543       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); ++i) 
00544         for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); ++j) 
00545                   (*this)(i,j) += s*B(i,j);
00546     }

00591     template<class V>
00592     void mv (Vector<V>& y, const Vector<V>& x) const
00593     {
00594       if (this->rowsize()!=y.size()) 
00595         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and y do not match");
00596       if (this->colsize()!=x.size()) 
00597         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and x do not match");
00598       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); ++i) 
00599         {
00600           y[i] = 0;
00601                   for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); ++j) 
00602             y[i] += (*this)(i,j)*x[j];
00603         }
00604     }

00653     template<class V>
00654     void umv (Vector<V>& y, const Vector<V>& x) const
00655     {
00656       if (this->rowsize()!=y.size()) 
00657         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and y do not match");
00658       if (this->colsize()!=x.size()) 
00659         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and x do not match");
00660       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); ++i) 
00661         {
00662                   for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); ++j) 
00663             y[i] += (*this)(i,j)*x[j];
00664         }
00665     }

00716     template<class V>
00717         void umv (Vector<V>& y, const V& s, const Vector<V>& x) const
00718     {
00719       if (this->rowsize()!=y.size()) 
00720         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and y do not match");
00721       if (this->colsize()!=x.size()) 
00722         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and x do not match");
00723       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); ++i) 
00724         {
00725                   for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); ++j) 
00726             y[i] += s*(*this)(i,j)*x[j];
00727         }
00728     }

00780     void mm (const DenseMatrix<REAL>& A, const DenseMatrix<REAL>& B)
00781     {
00782       if (this->rowsize()!=A.rowsize()) 
00783         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00784       if (this->colsize()!=B.colsize()) 
00785         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00786       if (A.colsize()!=B.rowsize()) 
00787         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00788 
00789       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00790         for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00791           {
00792             (*this)(i,j) = 0;
00793             for (std::size_t k=0; k<A.colsize(); k++)
00794               (*this)(i,j) += A(i,k)*B(k,j);
00795           }
00796     }
00797 
00798 
00853     void umm (const DenseMatrix<REAL>& A, const DenseMatrix<REAL>& B)
00854     {
00855       if (this->rowsize()!=A.rowsize()) 
00856         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00857       if (this->colsize()!=B.colsize()) 
00858         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00859       if (A.colsize()!=B.rowsize()) 
00860         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00861 
00862       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00863         for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00864                   for (std::size_t k=0; k<A.colsize(); k++)
00865             (*this)(i,j) += A(i,k)*B(k,j);
00866     }

00904     void sc (const Vector<REAL>& x, std::size_t k)
00905     {
00906       if (this->rowsize()!=x.size()) 
00907         HDNUM_ERROR("cc: size incompatible");
00908 
00909       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00910         (*this)(i,k) = x[i];
00911     }
00912 
00949     void sr (const Vector<REAL>& x, std::size_t k)
00950     {
00951       if (this->colsize()!=x.size()) 
00952         HDNUM_ERROR("cc: size incompatible");
00953 
00954       for (std::size_t i=0; i<colsize(); i++)
00955         (*this)(k,i) = x[i];
00956     }

00958 
00960     REAL norm_infty () const
00961     {
00962       REAL norm(0.0);
00963       for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00964         {
00965           REAL sum(0.0);
00966           for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00967             sum += myabs((*this)(i,j));
00968           if (sum>norm) norm = sum;
00969         }
00970       return norm;
00971     }
00972 
00974     REAL norm_1 () const
00975     {
00976       REAL norm(0.0);
00977       for (std::size_t j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00978         {
00979           REAL sum(0.0);
00980           for (std::size_t i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00981             sum += myabs((*this)(i,j));
00982           if (sum>norm) norm = sum;
00983         }
00984       return norm;
00985     }

01035         Vector<REAL> operator* (const Vector<REAL> & x)
01036         {
01037           assert( x.size() == rowsize() );
01038           
01039           Vector<REAL> y( rowsize() );
01040           for(std::size_t r=0; r<rowsize(); ++r){
01041                 for(std::size_t c=0; c<colsize(); ++c){
01042                   y[r]+= at(r,c) * x[c];
01043                 }
01044           }
01045           return y;
01046         }
01047         
01048         
01049 
01050         
01094         DenseMatrix operator* (const DenseMatrix & x) const
01095         {
01096           assert(colsize() == x.rowsize());
01097           
01098           const std::size_t out_rows = rowsize();
01099           const std::size_t out_cols = x.colsize();
01100           DenseMatrix y(out_rows, out_cols,0.0);
01101           for(std::size_t r=0; r<out_rows; ++r)
01102                 for(std::size_t c=0; c<out_cols; ++c)
01103                   for(std::size_t i=0; i<colsize(); ++i)
01104                         y(r,c) += at(r,i) * x(i,c);
01105           
01106           return y;
01107         }
01108 
01109 
01110 
01154         DenseMatrix operator+ (const DenseMatrix & x) const
01155         {
01156           assert(colsize() == x.rowsize());
01157           
01158           const std::size_t out_rows = rowsize();
01159           const std::size_t out_cols = x.colsize();
01160           DenseMatrix y(out_rows, out_cols,0.0);
01161       y = *this;
01162       y+=x;
01163           return y;
01164         }
01165 
01166 
01167 
01211         DenseMatrix operator- (const DenseMatrix & x) const
01212         {
01213           assert(colsize() == x.rowsize());
01214           
01215           const std::size_t out_rows = rowsize();
01216           const std::size_t out_cols = x.colsize();
01217           DenseMatrix y(out_rows, out_cols,0.0);
01218       y = *this;
01219       y-=x;
01220           return y;
01221         }

01228   template<typename REAL>
01229   bool DenseMatrix<REAL>::bScientific = true;
01230   template<typename REAL>
01231   std::size_t DenseMatrix<REAL>::nIndexWidth = 10;
01232   template<typename REAL>
01233   std::size_t DenseMatrix<REAL>::nValueWidth = 10;
01234   template<typename REAL>
01235   std::size_t DenseMatrix<REAL>::nValuePrecision = 3;

01261   template <typename REAL>
01262   inline std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& s, const DenseMatrix<REAL>& A)
01263   {
01264         s << std::endl;
01265         s << " " << std::setw(A.iwidth()) << " " << "  ";
01266         for (typename DenseMatrix<REAL>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
01267           s << std::setw(A.width()) << j << " ";
01268         s << std::endl;
01269 
01270         for (typename DenseMatrix<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
01271           {
01272                 s << " " << std::setw(A.iwidth()) << i << "  ";
01273                 for (typename DenseMatrix<REAL>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
01274                   {
01275                         if( A.scientific() )
01276                           {
01277                                 s << std::setw(A.width()) 
01278                                   << std::scientific 
01279                                   << std::showpoint 
01280                                   << std::setprecision(A.precision()) 
01281                                   << A[i][j] << " ";
01282                           }
01283                         else
01284                           {
01285                                 s << std::setw(A.width()) 
01286                                   << std::fixed
01287                                   << std::showpoint 
01288                                   << std::setprecision(A.precision()) 
01289                                   << A[i][j] << " ";
01290                           }
01291                   }
01292                 s << std::endl;
01293           }
01294     return s;
01295   }

01299   template<typename REAL>
01300   inline void zero (DenseMatrix<REAL> &A)
01301   {
01302     for (std::size_t i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
01303           for (std::size_t j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
01304         A(i,j) = REAL(0);
01305   }

01341   template<class T>
01342   inline void identity (DenseMatrix<T> &A)
01343   {
01344     for (typename DenseMatrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
01345       for (typename DenseMatrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
01346         if (i==j)
01347           A[i][i] = T(1);
01348         else
01349           A[i][j] = T(0);
01350   }
01351 
01387   template<typename REAL>
01388   inline void spd (DenseMatrix<REAL> &A)
01389   {
01390         if (A.rowsize()!=A.colsize() || A.rowsize()==0) 
01391           HDNUM_ERROR("need square and nonempty matrix");
01392     for (std::size_t i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
01393           for (std::size_t j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
01394                 if (i==j)
01395                   A(i,i) = REAL(4.0);
01396                 else
01397                   A(i,j) = - REAL(1.0)/((i-j)*(i-j));
01398   }
01399 
01449   template<typename REAL>
01450   inline void vandermonde (DenseMatrix<REAL> &A, const Vector<REAL> x)
01451   {
01452         if (A.rowsize()!=A.colsize() || A.rowsize()==0) 
01453           HDNUM_ERROR("need square and nonempty matrix");
01454         if (A.rowsize()!=x.size()) 
01455           HDNUM_ERROR("need A and x of same size");
01456     for (typename DenseMatrix<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
01457       {
01458         REAL p(1.0);
01459         for (typename DenseMatrix<REAL>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
01460           {
01461             A[i][j] = p;
01462             p *= x[i];
01463           }
01464       }
01465   }

01468   template<typename REAL>
01469   inline void gnuplot (const std::string& fname, const DenseMatrix<REAL> &A)
01470   {
01471     std::fstream f(fname.c_str(),std::ios::out); 
01472     for (typename DenseMatrix<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
01473       {
01474         for (typename DenseMatrix<REAL>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
01475                   {
01476                         if( A.scientific() )
01477                           {
01478                                 f << std::setw(A.width()) 
01479                                   << std::scientific 
01480                                   << std::showpoint 
01481                                   << std::setprecision(A.precision()) << A[i][j];
01482                           }
01483                         else
01484                           {
01485                                 f << std::setw(A.width()) 
01486                                   << std::fixed
01487                                   << std::showpoint 
01488                                   << std::setprecision(A.precision()) << A[i][j];
01489                           }
01490                   }
01491                 f << std::endl;
01492       }
01493     f.close();
01494   }

01527   template<typename REAL>
01528   inline void readMatrixFromFile (const std::string& filename, DenseMatrix<REAL> &A)
01529   {
01530     std::string buffer;
01531     std::ifstream fin( filename.c_str() );
01532     std::size_t i=0;
01533     std::size_t j=0;
01534     if( fin.is_open() ){
01535       while( std::getline( fin, buffer ) ){
01536         std::istringstream iss(buffer);
01537         hdnum::Vector<REAL> rowvector;
01538         while( iss ){
01539           std::string sub;
01540           iss >> sub;
01541           //std::cout << " sub = " << sub.c_str() << ": ";
01542           if( sub.length()>0 ){
01543             REAL a = atof(sub.c_str());
01544             //std::cout << std::fixed << std::setw(10) << std::setprecision(5) << a;
01545             rowvector.push_back(a);
01546           }
01547           j++;
01548         }
01549         if( rowvector.size()>0 ){
01550           A.addNewRow( rowvector );
01551           i++;
01552           //std::cout << std::endl;
01553         }
01554       }
01555       fin.close();
01556     }
01557     else{
01558       HDNUM_ERROR("Could not open file!");
01559     }
01560   }
